arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'BusinessUnit and User' adds the 'businessUnitId' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Fiscal calendar associated with the facility/equipment.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Organization' adds the 'organizationId' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the parent business unit.
Local time zone where the facility/equipment is located.
Date and time when the record was created.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdBy' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the facility/equipment entry.
Date and time when the record was modified.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedBy' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the facility/equipment.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the equipment.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the equipment.
Sequence number of the import that created this record.
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.
Email address of person to contact about the use of the facility/equipment.
Whether the facility/equipment is disabled or operational.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Site' adds the 'siteId' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Site where the facility/equipment is located.
Skills needed to operate the facility/equipment.
Exchange rate for the currency associated with the equipment with respect to the base currency.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Currency' adds the 'transactionCurrencyId' attribute below to the 'FacilityEquipment' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the equipment.
